abstract: The nation’s six largest cable companies are planning a jointly owned company that would allow national advertisers to buy customized ads across their systems.
snippet: The nation’s six largest cable companies are planning a jointly owned company that would allow national advertisers to buy customized ads across their systems.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to slow Google’s siphoning of advertising dollars away from television, the nation’s six largest cable companies are making plans for a jointly owned company that would allow national advertisers to buy customized ads and interactive ads across the companies’ systems.

headline.main: Cable Firms Join Forces to Attract Focused Ads
headline.print_headline: Cable Firms Join Forces To Attract Focused Ads
